task_description:
# Diamond Cell Inference Completion

Complete the diamond detection cell inference that is currently marked as TODO. Diamond detection works but cell inference from markers is incomplete.

## Rationale
This is explicit technical debt noted in the codebase. Completing it improves detection accuracy for puzzles using diamond markers.

## User Stories
- As a user with diamond-marked puzzles, I want accurate detection so that the full puzzle is captured

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Diamond markers correctly infer cell positions
- [ ] Works with various diamond sizes and orientations
- [ ] Integrates with grid detection pipeline
- [ ] Test coverage for diamond-based puzzles
